TopicTitle: [0.17]Jebediah Kerman's Junkyard and Spaceship Parts Co. - Moonbase Alpha Development

Articles.Content:
In responce to my challenge, Jeb decided to make something that will help everyone in the challenge. So Jeb use the scraps to design the parts for Moonbase Alpha Challenge. So...

He design 5 life support modules, an equipment shed, a solar generator, some power cables (Or call it the Oxygen Cable because in NASA's Moonbase Alpha, which is a game, the power cable can transfer power and oxygen.), some couplers (also transfer oxygen and power), solar panels, some rovers, a command central, 4 settlement modules, some Orion Command Modules and Service Modules, and finally, the Atlair Lunar Module.

He also designed some scenarios to hang the control of the settlement.

Anyway, the projects are: (Words in red means it is in development; yellow means it is avaliable for download, but partially implemented; green means it is fully implemented and avaliable for download; blue means it will start the on the day the version is released. Remember, all project is subjected to be upgraded, the time would be changed, and I have no obligation to implemented all, except the important items.)

1.Moonbase Alpha Project (0% - In progress)

2.Constellation Project (0% - On hold)

3.Space Shuttle Program (STS) (will start the day v0.18 is released)

4.International Space Station (ISS) (After Space Shuttle Program is done)

5.Mir Station (After Space Shuttle Program is done)

6.Hubble Space Telescope (Will start the day v0.18 is released)

7.Canadarm (Will start the day v0.18 is released)

8.SpaceX Dragon spacecraft and Falcon 9 (The last one will start the day v0.20 is released, the first one's times TBA)

And here's the update:

Moonbase Alpha Project Progress:

Part configuration: 18.75% --- In Progress

Module configuration: 0%

Texturing: 0%

Plugin: 0%

Testing: 0%

Total Complete: 0%

Constellation Project Progress:

Part configuration: 0% --- On Hold

Module configuration: 0%

Texturing: 0%

Plugin: 0%

Testing: 0%

Total Complete: 0%

Also keep in mind that I don't always complete the priority on time.

Also, I might need some help. I need someone to build the module for me and texture it because I will do Part configuration and testing and changes (part configuration is no party after all!) So...

I need some one who...

1. can build the module

2. texture it

3. Plugin building

Also keep in mind that you have to have one requirement to send a resume.

Post to this thread if you want a job, or e-mail me. Address: [email protected] (Don't be weird, it works)

And that's it. I'll keep you posted!
